root.name: Cogs
root.description: OverviewDeveloped by Lazy 8 Studios, Cogs is a puzzle game where all the given pieces in the set board, or contraption must be connected in order to have the machine work properly. The puzzle pieces are, but limited to, cog pieces, pipes, and bells, or sometimes combination of two or three. The puzzle boards are not limited in 2D view, they can be turned around to see the backside, and sometimes that is also part of puzzle. There are three types of rewards for completing puzzles. One is for solving the puzzle, another one for solving the puzzle fast as possible and another one for solving the puzzle with least number of moves.
